department.dept_long_name: Department of Chemistry and Chemical Biology

course.title: Statistical Thermodynamics
course.description: An introduction to statistical mechanics, thermodynamics, and chemical kinetics with strong emphasis on applications to problems in chemistry and biology. Topics include: thermodynamics and statistical properties of gases, liquids and crystals, critical phenomena, elements of non-equilibrium statistical mechanics with applications to Chemistry and Biophysics such as theories for biopolymers and chemical reactions.
course.prerequisites: Chemistry 160 and Chemistry 161, or permission of instructor.
